devdoc.details: A vault adapter implementation which migrates users to version 2

params.data: The resulting data from the call. This is error data when the call was not a                success. Otherwise, this is malformed data when the call was a success.
params.success: If the call to the token was a success.

params._amount: the amount of tokens to deposit into the vault.

token().details: Gets the token that the vault accepts.

totalValue().details: Gets the total value of the assets that the adapter holds.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Withdraws tokens from the vault to the recipient. This function reverts if the caller is not the admin. This function reverts if the user has already migrated.

params._amount: the amount of tokens to withdraw.
params._recipient: the account to withdraw the tokes to.

admin.details: The address which has admin control over this contract.

debtToken.details: The address of the debt token.

hasMigrated.details: The map of users who have/haven't migrated.

migratedUsers.details: The array of users who have migrated.

devdoc.title: TransferAdapter

ERC20CallFailed(address,bool,bytes).notice: An error used to indicate that a call to an ERC20 contract failed.

IllegalArgument().notice: An error used to indicate that an action could not be completed because of an illegal argument was passed         to the function.

IllegalArgument(string).notice: An error used to indicate that an argument passed to a function is illegal or         inappropriate.

IllegalState(string).notice: An error used to indicate that a function has encountered an unrecoverable state.
